channel.title: Garden on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Garden on mattischrome

item.title: The Garden
item.description: Today, we transferred our Christmas tree to a new pot. Being root-bound as the tree was, it took ages to get it out of the crappy pot from the store and into the new, bigger pot. And I’m pretty sure it’s a bit wonky, which might make the baubles a bit lopsided next Christmas. It looks excellent next to the new bird bath. Nonetheless, it was nice to get another plant into a pot with the hope of keeping it around.
